Articles.Content: I have been convinced that 0.21 is never ever ever coming out
Pretty sure Squad never releases on Fridays or weekends due to past issues.
It'll be released after the heat death of the universe

22/7 here.

(Different format, And I'm one day head of you lot )

I'm happy for them to keep working on it until it's near perfect.

So, remember when we were told they were going to be releasing smaller, more frequent updates?

So, remember when we were told they were going to be releasing smaller, more frequent updates?

yes but the other problem is just finding bugs and that will take a long time no matter what. there are probably more bugs in .21 compared to other updates because of the save file changes.
